channel.title: KVM on 无名的旅人
channel.description: Recent content in KVM on 无名的旅人

item.title: KVM/libvirt forwarding ports to guest via iptables
item.description: # connections from outside sudo iptables -I FORWARD -o virbr0 -d 192.168.122.226 -j ACCEPT sudo iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp --dport 8006 -j DNAT --to 192.
